TopicTitle: How do I restore my science junior in kerbalism

Articles.Content: I have a level one scientist and I'm playing GPP with kerbalism, how do I restore my science junior because I don't want to take multiple science juniors with me to orbit and back

It's a while since I played Kerbalism in stock KSP (rather than the RSS/RO version), so I may be wrong but I think default Kerbalism profile needs a science lab to restore samples in depletable experiments. (Some experiments have upgrades that unlock later in the tech tree where they start with more than one sample.)

are you serious

thanks for the info anyway
